Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2012 10:58PM jhuffman172003 wrote: Thank you for the reply. I go to the doctor tomorrow morning. Mine seems to have gotten longer and doesn't really move. I pray for a positive diagnosis. The unknown is enough to drive anyone crazy. Just has to keep focused through meditation and prayer. Ill post tomorrow when I know something.
Posts.Title: This is me! amberzas jhuffman172003

Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2012 11:22PM jhuffman172003 wrote: I know what you mean about the worries of the unknown. I'm scared too. I'm 36 years old and found a small hard oblong shaped lump in my lower armpit 3 weeks ago (like a uncooked grain of rice). I had a full hysterectomy at 30 and have been hormone replacement since. My gyn sent me to a breast specialist who did an ultrasound that showed nothing. She sent me for a mammogram that also showed nothing. There is definitely something there and I'm worried. There is no history of breast cancer in my family. Freaking out!!
